Good morning Brookhaven! We're back again in your inbox, keeping you updated with what's happening in and around town. â˜€ï¸ In today's newsletter:
- Brookhaven protest against ICE raids turns chaotic
Also on today's calendar: State of the City Address with Brookhaven Mayor John Park and 9 other events.

ðŸ“° News we're reading
â€¢ Tear Gas, Fireworks Deployed At Metro ATL Anti-ICE Raid: Reports (patch.com) â€” A protest against ICE raids in Brookhaven turned chaotic as police used tear gas and fireworks were ignited, resulting in six arrests. The demonstration, part of a larger wave of protests, highlighted local tensions over immigration policies.
